title: Careers | Kimley-Horn
text: Your future starts here. Join a team where passion meets purpose, your work drives real impact, and endless opportunities shape a career that excites and fulfills you. At Kimley-Horn, we value your entrepreneurial spirit, invest in your future, and take pride in driving impactful change for our clients and communities. If you require an accommodation, please CLICK HERE Our People. At Kimley-Horn, you’ll work alongside people who are more than coworkers—they’re partners, collaborators, and champions of your success. Our professionals stand out not just for the depth and breadth of their expertise or the exceptional quality of their work—but for their passion, support, and drive to make a difference for their communities and their clients. A great place to work. Working at Kimley-Horn means joining a team-oriented culture, building a meaningful career, enjoying world-class benefits, and being empowered to embrace an entrepreneurial spirit—all within an employee-owned firm where you can truly thrive. But don’t just take our word for it—see how others are recognizing our people-first culture and outstanding workplace experience. Kimley-Horn Recognized as One of the 2025 Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work for Kimley-Horn Named One of the 2025 PEOPLE Companies that Care Kimley-Horn Ranked as a 2025 Best Workplace in Consulting & Professional Services Kimley-Horn Internship Program Named #1 on Yello’s 2025 Top 100 List
